section.title: 识别验证码
section.screen:
(.venv) neo@Neo-Mac-mini netkiller % labelme2yolo --json_dir captcha/images [2024-11-19T07:06:52Z INFO labelme2yolo] Starting the conversion process... [2024-11-19T07:06:52Z INFO labelme2yolo] Read and parsed 20 JSON files. [Train] [00:00:00] [########################################] 16/16 (0s) [Val] [00:00:00] [########################################] 4/4 (0s) [2024-11-19T07:06:52Z INFO labelme2yolo] Creating dataset.yaml file... [2024-11-19T07:06:52Z INFO labelme2yolo] Conversion process completed successfully.
(.venv) neo@Neo-Mac-mini netkiller % ls captcha/images/YOLODataset dataset.yaml images labels

yolo task=detect mode=train model=yolo11n.pt data=captcha/images/YOLODataset/dataset.yaml epochs=50 workers=1 batch=10
yolo predict model=runs/detect/train/weights/best.pt source=captcha/test/0_5902.png
